sparkling_gift.name: Sparkling Gesture
sparkling_gift.summary: Find a glittering keepsake that Alicia can gift to Laura.
sparkling_gift.description: Alicia wants to surprise Laura with a shimmering token. She believes a rare teardrop crystal from the lower tunnels would be perfect.
objectives: Locate a Glittering Teardrop in the dungeon.
Return it to Alicia so she can craft a gift for Laura.

golden_promise.name: Golden Promise
golden_promise.summary: Secure an ornate ring so Laura can work with new material.
golden_promise.description: Laura needs an unmarked golden band taken from a rare undead. She is willing to pay well for anyone brave enough to retrieve it.
objectives: Acquire an Untarnished Signet from the depths.
Deliver the ring to Laura at her forge.

silent_shipment.name: The Silent Shipment
silent_shipment.description: The Gate Guard is worried about a shipment that never arrived. He suspects someone in town might know more.
objectives: Ask around town about the shipment.
Speak to Alicia about any strange sightings.
Return to the Gate Guard with your findings.

cartographers_plea.name: Cartographer's Plea
cartographers_plea.summary: Map out the third floor of the dungeon.
cartographers_plea.description: The guild needs updated maps of the Rusted Choir (Floor 3). Reach the floor to prove the path is open.

bone_collector.name: Bone Collector
bone_collector.description: Laura needs sturdy bone material to reinforce her armors. Skeletons usually carry these.

lost_in_the_dark.name: Lost in the Dark
lost_in_the_dark.description: The skeletons on Floor 1 are getting too numerous. Bring back their plates as proof of culling.

floral_study.name: Floral Study
floral_study.summary: Retrieve a Rare Flower from the forest.
floral_study.description: Alicia has read about a flower that blooms in the Overgrown Forest. She wants one for her collection.
objectives: Find a Rare Flower on Floor 4 or 5.

pest_control.name: Pest Control
pest_control.description: Giant Spiders in the forest are a threat. Bring back their toxic spores as proof of their demise.

natures_wrath.name: Nature's Wrath
natures_wrath.description: Laura wants to experiment with poison-resistant coatings. She needs raw material.

cold_comfort.name: Cold Comfort
cold_comfort.description: The heat in town is unbearable lately. Alicia wants Ice Shards from the Sunken Caverns to cool the tavern.

deep_diver.name: Deep Diver
deep_diver.description: The fish-men are organizing. Break their ranks and bring back proof.

the_glow_below.name: The Glow Below
the_glow_below.description: Laura heard of a glowing moss in the Sunken Caverns that can be used for lamp oil.

tick_tock.name: Tick Tock
tick_tock.description: Alicia found a broken music box. She needs a specific gear from the Clockwork Spire to fix it.
objectives: Find a Clock Gear from Automatons.

ghost_in_the_machine.name: Ghost in the Machine
ghost_in_the_machine.description: The ticking noise is driving the guards crazy. Smash the machines.

schematic_hunt.name: Schematic Hunt
schematic_hunt.description: Laura believes the constructs are built from ancient plans. Find one so she can study it.
objectives: Find a Mechanism Blueprint from Clockwork Knights.

edge_of_reason.name: Edge of Reason
edge_of_reason.description: Scholars want to study the void without entering it. Bring them some dust.

ultimate_hunter.name: The Ultimate Hunter
ultimate_hunter.description: If you can kill the things in the Void, maybe we have a chance. Prove it.
objectives: Defeat a Void Eater and collect its residue (Void Dust).
